newsitem.title: JAPAN: Brunei cuts March crude prices by $2.40/bbl - trader.
newsitem.headline: Brunei cuts March crude prices by $2.40/bbl - trader.

text.p: Brunei has cut the price of its crude oil for March by $2.40 per barrel for both Champion and Seria Light, traders said on Tuesday.
Brunei set the price of its benchmark Seria Light crude oil for March at $22.95 per barrel, down $2.40 from February, oil traders said.
The March price for Brunei's Champion crude was set at $22.75, also down $2.40 from the previous month, they said.
Brunei set a provisional price of $22.60 for April Seria Light and $22.40 for April Champion crude.
